trans-unit.target: powershell cmdlet
Enable-pssessionconfiguration
Enable-pssessionconfiguration
简述

trans-unit.source: Enables the session configurations on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 启用本地计算机上的会话配置。
语法
说明

trans-unit.source: The **Enable-PSSessionConfiguration** cmdlet enables registered session configurations that have been disabled, such as by using the Disable-PSSessionConfiguration or Disable-PSRemoting cmdlets, or the **AccessMode** parameter of Register-PSSessionConfiguration.
trans-unit.target: **Enable-pssessionconfiguration** cmdlet 可启用已注册的会话配置已被禁用，例如通过使用 Disable-pssessionconfiguration 或 Disable-psremoting cmdlet，或 **AccessMode** Register-pssessionconfiguration 参数。

trans-unit.source: This is an advanced cmdlet that is designed to be used by system administrators to manage customized session configurations for their users.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个高级 cmdlet，旨在供系统管理员为其用户管理自定义会话配置时使用。

trans-unit.source: Without parameters, **Enable-PSSessionConfiguration** enables the Microsoft.PowerShell configuration, which is the default configuration that is used for sessions.
trans-unit.target: 不带参数， **Enable-pssessionconfiguration** 启用 Microsoft.PowerShell 配置，是用于会话的默认配置。

trans-unit.source: **Enable-PSSessionConfiguration** removes the "Deny_All" setting from the security descriptor of the affected session configurations, turns on the listener that accepts requests on any IP address, and restarts the WinRM service.
trans-unit.target: **Enable-pssessionconfiguration** 从受影响的会话配置的安全描述符中删除"Deny_All"设置、 打开接受任何 IP 地址上的请求，并重新启动 WinRM 服务的侦听器。

trans-unit.source: Beginning in Windows PowerShell 3.0, **Enable-PSSessionConfiguration** also sets the value of the **Enabled** property of the session configuration (WSMan:\\\<computer\>\PlugIn\\\<SessionConfigurationName\>\Enabled) to "True".
trans-unit.target: 从 Windows PowerShell 3.0 开始 **Enable-pssessionconfiguration** 还将设置的值 **已启用** 会话配置的属性 (WSMan:\\\<计算机\>\PlugIn\\\<SessionConfigurationName\>\Enabled) 为"True"。

trans-unit.source: However, **Enable-PSSessionConfiguration** does not remove or change the "Network_Deny_All" (AccessMode=Local) security descriptor setting that allows only users of the local computer to use to the session configuration.
trans-unit.target: 但是， **Enable-pssessionconfiguration** 不会删除或更改"Network_Deny_All"(AccessMode = 本地) 安全描述符设置，仅允许用户的本地计算机以使用会话配置。
**Enable-pssessionconfiguration** cmdlet 可调用 **Set-wsmanquickconfig** cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: However, it should not be used to enable remoting on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 但是，不应使用它在计算机上启用远程处理。

trans-unit.source: Instead, use the more comprehensive cmdlet, Enable-PSRemoting.
trans-unit.target: 请改用更全面的 cmdlet 的 Enable-psremoting。
示例

trans-unit.source: This command re-enables the Microsoft.PowerShell default session configuration on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 此命令将重新启用计算机上的 Microsoft.PowerShell 默认会话配置。

trans-unit.source: This command re-enables the MaintenanceShell and AdminShell session configurations on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 此命令将重新启用计算机上的 MaintenanceShell 和 AdminShell 会话配置。

trans-unit.source: These commands re-enable all session configurations on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 这些命令将重新启用计算机上的所有会话配置。

trans-unit.source: The commands are equivalent, so you can use either one.
trans-unit.target: 这些命令是等效的，因此你可以使用其中任何一个。

trans-unit.source: Enable-PSSessionConfiguration does not generate an error if you enable a session configuration that is already enabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用已启用的某个会话配置，Enable-PSSessionConfiguration 将不会生成错误。

trans-unit.source: This command re-enables the MaintenanceShell session configuration and specifies a new security descriptor for the configuration.
trans-unit.target: 此命令将重新启用 MaintenanceShell 会话配置，并为该配置指定新的安全描述符。
参数
-Confirm

trans-unit.source: Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 将提示您在运行 cmdlet 前进行确认。将提示您在运行 cmdlet 前进行确认。
-Force

trans-unit.source: Suppresses all user prompts, and restarts the WinRM service without prompting.
trans-unit.target: 禁止显示所有用户提示，并且重新启动 WinRM 服务而不显示提示。

trans-unit.source: Restarting the service makes the configuration change effective.
trans-unit.target: 重新启动服务可使配置更改生效。

trans-unit.source: To prevent a restart and suppress the restart prompt, use the NoServiceRestart parameter.
trans-unit.target: 若要阻止重新启动并禁止显示重新启动提示，请使用 NoServiceRestart 参数。
-Name

trans-unit.source: Specifies the names of session configurations to enable.
trans-unit.target: 指定要启用的会话配置的名称。

trans-unit.source: Enter one or more configuration names.
trans-unit.target: 输入一个或多个配置名称。
允许使用通配符。

trans-unit.source: You can also pipe a string that contains a configuration name or a session configuration object to Enable-PSSessionConfiguration.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以通过管道将包含配置名称的字符串或会话配置对象传递给 Enable-PSSessionConfiguration。

trans-unit.source: If you omit this parameter, Enable-PSSessionConfiguration enables the Microsoft.PowerShell session configuration.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，则 Enable-PSSessionConfiguration 将启用 Microsoft.PowerShell 会话配置。
-SecurityDescriptorSddl

trans-unit.source: Replaces the security descriptor on the session configuration with the specified security descriptor.
trans-unit.target: 将会话配置上的安全描述符替换为指定的安全描述符。

trans-unit.source: If you omit this parameter, Enable-PSSessionConfiguration just deletes the "deny all" item from the security descriptor.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，则 Enable-PSSessionConfiguration 仅从安全描述符中删除“全部拒绝”项。
-SkipNetworkProfileCheck

trans-unit.source: Enables the session configuration when the computer is on a public network.
trans-unit.target: 当计算机位于公用网络上时，启用会话配置。

trans-unit.source: This parameter enables a firewall rule for public networks that allows remote access only from computers in the same local subnet.
trans-unit.target: 此参数只允许为公用网络启用防火墙规则，该规则只允许远程访问同一本地子网中的计算机。

trans-unit.source: By default, **Enable-PSSessionConfiguration** fails on a public network.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下， **Enable-pssessionconfiguration** 在公用网络上失败。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is designed for client versions of Windows.
trans-unit.target: 此参数专门用于 Windows 的客户端版本。

trans-unit.source: Server versions of Windows have a local subnet firewall rule for public networks by default.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，Windows 的服务器版本具有适用于公用网络的本地子网防火墙规则。

trans-unit.source: However, if the local subnet firewall rule is disabled on a server version of Windows, this parameter re-enables it.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果在 Windows 的服务器版本上禁用了本地子网防火墙规则，则此参数将重新启用它。

trans-unit.source: To remove the local subnet restriction and enable remote access from all locations on public networks, use the Set-NetFirewallRule cmdlet in the NetSecurity module.
trans-unit.target: 若要删除本地子网限制并从公用网络上的所有位置进行远程访问，请使用 NetSecurity 模块中的 Set-NetFirewallRule cmdlet。
有关详细信息，请参阅 Enable-psremoting。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 此参数是在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 中引入的。
-WhatIf

trans-unit.source: Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs.
trans-unit.target: 显示如果运行 cmdlet 则会发生什么情况。

trans-unit.source: The cmdlet is not run.Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs.
trans-unit.target: 该 cmdlet 不会运行。显示在 cmdlet 运行时，会发生什么情况。
cmdlet 未运行。
CommonParameters

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet supports the common parameters: -Debug, -ErrorAction, -ErrorVariable, -InformationAction, -InformationVariable, -OutVariable, -OutBuffer, -PipelineVariable, -Verbose, -WarningAction, and -WarningVariable.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 支持以下常见参数:-调试-ErrorAction、-ErrorVariable、-InformationAction、-InformationVariable、-OutVariable、-OutBuffer、-PipelineVariable、-Verbose、-WarningAction 和-WarningVariable。
有关详细信息，请参阅 about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216)。
输入
Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.PSSessionConfigurationCommands#PSSessionConfiguration System.String

trans-unit.source: You can pipe a session configuration object or a string that contains the name of a session configuration to Enable-PSSessionConfiguration.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过管道将会话配置对象或包含会话配置名称的字符串传递给 Enable-PSSessionConfiguration。
输出
无

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet does not return any objects.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 不返回任何对象。
说明

trans-unit.source: To run this cmdlet on Windows Vista, Windows Server 2008, and later versions of Windows, you must start Windows PowerShell with the "Run as administrator" option.
trans-unit.target: 若要在 Windows Vista、Windows Server 2008 以及更高版本的 Windows 上运行此 cmdlet，则必须使用“以管理员身份运行”选项启动 Windows PowerShell。
相关的链接

Enable-pssessionconfiguration
Get-PSSessionConfiguration
New-PSSessionConfigurationFile
New-PSSessionOption
Register-PSSessionConfiguration
Set-pssessionconfiguration
Test-PSSessionConfigurationFile
注销 PSSessionConfiguration
